newsitem.title: THAILAND: Export value of Jan-May Thai vehicle parts rises.
newsitem.headline: Export value of Jan-May Thai vehicle parts rises.

text.p: The export value of Thai assembled vehicles and parts rose 133 percent in the first five months to 8.23 billion baht ($293 million) from 3.53 billion baht during the same period last year, an industry group said.

The export value of cars and car parts during the January-May period surged to 5.27 billion baht from 909 million in the same period a year ago, the Thai Automotive Industry Association said in a statement.
The value of motorcycles and motorcycle part exports in the period was up to 2.97 billion baht from 2.62 billion in the same period in a previous year, it said.
The total number of cars and commercial vehicles assembled in Thailand in the first five months was down 5.47 percent to 215,645 from 228,117 in the same period last year, it said.
